title: Peach Couture Luxurious Classic Soft Cashmere and Silk Blend Pashmina Wrap Shawl
features: New By Peach Couture (A Registered Trademark Company)
Made in Nepal with the classic Blend of 70% Certified Cashmere and 30% Silk
Product Dimensions: 28" x 80", Plus 3 " of hand knotted fringes on both sides
Cashmere and Silk pashmina shawls are a luxurious must-have accessory during the fall and winter
Exquisitely light and soft silky shawl available in array of beautiful colors
description: Cashmere and Silk Blend Pashmina shawls are a luxurious and classy accessory for your wardrobe! These shawls, wraps, and scarves are available in an array of beautiful colors to match any outfit. Simply styled for a casual or more formal occasion. These are the perfect addition to a bridesmaids ensemble, adding beauty and elegance to your lifelong wedding memories. Perfect for the fall and winter seasons, these shawls withstand the test of time and can be worn for years to come! The cashmere and silk blend create a light and silky touch, more-so than 100% cashmere. Made of 70% Cashmere and 30% Silk. Product Dimensions: 28" x 80", Plus 3 " of hand knotted fringes on both sides.
